Improvements.Description: The method 'buildAnnotations' is too large and does several things. For better readability, maintainability, and testability, refactor the creation of each annotation into its own method.

Improvements.Improvement: Use switch statement for ENUM_ORDINAL and TIME checks.
Improvements.Description: Instead of multiple if statements, use a switch statement to compare dimension.getType().toUpperCase(Locale.ROOT) to ENUM_ORDINAL and TIME, it will increase the readability and performance.
